mapper.select: SELECT GUID, CLFNUMBERREGULARGUID, FIELDNAME, ISCLASSFIELD, DATASEQ, FIELDTYPE, CODERULEVALUE, FIELDLENGTH, PREFIX, SUFFIX, CONTROLLEDNUMBERFIELDGUID, ISDATEBYUSER, TYPEVALUE, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID FROM CLASSIFICATION_NUMBER_FIELD CC ORDER BY DATASEQ,UPDATETIME

SELECT GUID, CLFNUMBERREGULARGUID, FIELDNAME, ISCLASSFIELD, DATASEQ, FIELDTYPE, CODERULEVALUE, FIELDLENGTH, PREFIX, SUFFIX, CONTROLLEDNUMBERFIELDGUID, ISDATEBYUSER, TYPEVALUE, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID FROM CLASSIFICATION_NUMBER_FIELD CC WHERE GUID = #GUID#
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CLASSIFICATION_NUMBER_FIELD (GUID, CLFNUMBERREGULARGUID, FIELDNAME, ISCLASSFIELD, DATASEQ, FIELDTYPE, CODERULEVALUE, FIELDLENGTH, PREFIX, SUFFIX, CONTROLLEDNUMBERFIELDGUID, ISDATEBYUSER, TYPEVALUE,
CREATEUSERGUID, CREATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME) VALUES (#GUID#, #CLFNUMBERREGULARGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISCLASSFIELD:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DATASEQ#, #FIELDTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CODERULEVALUE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDLENGTH:NUMERIC:0#, #PREFIX:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SUFFIX:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CONTROLLEDNUMBERFIELDGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISDATEBYUSER:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TYPEVALUE:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#)
mapper.update:
UPDATE CLASSIFICATION_NUMBER_FIELD
UPDATETIME=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, UPDATEUSERGUID=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, GUID=#GUID#, CLFNUMBERREGULARGUID=#CLFNUMBERREGULARGUID#, FIELDNAME=#FIELDNAME#, ISCLASSFIELD=#ISCLASSFIELD#, DATASEQ=#DATASEQ#, FIELDTYPE=#FIELDTYPE#, CODERULEVALUE=#CODERULEVALUE#, FIELDLENGTH=#FIELDLENGTH#, PREFIX=#PREFIX#, SUFFIX=#SUFFIX#, CONTROLLEDNUMBERFIELDGUID=#CONTROLLEDNUMBERFIELDGUID#, ISDATEBYUSER=#ISDATEBYUSER#, TYPEVALUE=#TYPEVALUE#,
WHERE GUID = #GUID#
